questions.1: Zeziphina ezona ntetho zibalaseleyo ezithe zabhengezwa kwi nkomfa yoonondaba?

questions.4: Lwazi luni oluthe lwavela ngelixa leseshoni yemibuzo neempendulo?

questions.7: Zithini iinkcukacha zonxibelelwano zabo baququzelela le nkomfa (ii-nombolo zomnxeba) mhlawumbi kubekho amakhwiniba/okudinga ingcaciso?

questions.10: Fumana izimvo zabaqeqeshi, abadlali kwakunye nabalandeli bamaqela omabini.
questions.11: Ubukhulu bezihlwele babungakanani na kwaye ziziphethe njani na?
questions.13: Uthathe ixesha elingakanani na umdlalo kwaye udlulele kwixesha elongeziweyo na?

questions.7: Iziphumo zalomdlalo zizichaphazela njani i-standings, i-rankings nee-rekhodi zaba dlali?
questions.9: Ingaba akhona na ama-rekhodi okugqwesa okanye ukubethwa kumaqela nabadlali?

questions.5: Ingaba esi sigulo sikhawuleza sosulele kwaye zikhe zakhona kusini na ezinye iingxelo ngesi sigulo kwindawo ohlala kuyo okanye phesheya?
questions.6: Ngoobani na iingxwelerha? Amagama, iminyaka yobudala, iidilesi nezinye iinkcukacha.
questions.7: Zithini izimvo ezenzwe ngabasebenzi bezempilo ngesi sigulo, ukuba bezikhona?
questions.8: Uthini umgama ohanjwe zizigulane odlene nazo indlebe ukuze zifike phaya kwaye lithini ixabiso lesithuthi, ukuya nokubuya?

questions.1: Ngubani na igama elipheleleyo lalowo ubhala ngaye?
questions.12: Shwankathela neyiphi na inkxaxheba yakhe/yabo ekuhlaleni nakwi hlabathi.
questions.13: Chaza izehlo zezo politiko okanye ezasekuhlaleni zibe ntathu ubuncinane nezathi zehla ngethuba umfi esaphila? Kwi sehlo ngasinye cacisa ukuba ingaba simchaphazele njani umfi?
questions.2: Ingakanani na iminyaka yabo yobu dala nosuku loku zalwa?
questions.3: Yintoni igama lendawo yabo/yakhe yokuzalwa kwaye e/bebehlala phi?
questions.6: Ungaba chaza njani ngokwe simo sabo? (Oku kubalulekile ukuphuhliseni umdla webali lakho.)
questions.7: Iinkcukacha zokuba ngumntu/ngabantu abanjani na? (Buza usapho nezihlobo)
questions.8: Iinkcukacha ze nqanaba lemfundo yakhe? (Ukhankanye neziphina ii-degrees azifundeleyo)
questions.9: Iinkcukacha ngendlela ayiyo kusapho lwakhe, kwizihlobo kwakunye nabo asebenza nabo.

questions.1: Lithini igama, ubudala, idilesi nomsebenzi womfi?
questions.2: Belisithini na ixesha, indawo kwakunye nembangi yokufa?
questions.3: Luthini usuku loku zalwa nendawo yoku zalwa yomfi?
questions.5: Athini na amalungiselelo enkonzo yomngcwabo nokufihla?
questions.8: Bebe ngamalungu amaqela okanye ii-sosayeti ezifana nee-stokvel, i-Rotary okanye i-Lions?
questions.9: Ingaba bakhe balwenza na uqeqesho kwi nkonzo yobu joni?

questions.10: Ingaba unazo na ii-kopi zee ntetha kwakunye/okanye iimpepha zentsusaphi?
questions.11: Zithini iinkcukacha zonxibelelwano (ii-nombolo-mnxeba/amakhadi eshishini) zabo bathe benza intetha, mlawumbi kubekho amakhwiniba/okungaqondakaliyo?
questions.2: Ngubani igama nesikhundla sesithethi esiphambili? (Uqinisekise ukuba igama libhalwe kakuhle!)
questions.3: Ngeziphi iintetho-nqo onazo ongazisebenzisa ukuxhasa elona nqaku libalaseleyo?

questions.9: Ingaba kukhona okongezelekileyo kwi sashoni yemibuzo neempendulo?

questions.1: Icebo: Qinisekisa ukuba une sikhafu eside kwakunye ne bhotile ye vinika (ncinda isikhafu kwi vinika leyo xa amapolisa esebenzisa i-teargas).
questions.10: Kwakukhe kwabakho iintshukumo zoqhankqalazo eziyelelene nezi kumaxesha adlulileyo (Zazi ngaphi, nini, phi) kwaye ingaba ikhona na into eyaba yimpumelelo?
questions.11: Iziphatha-mandla kwakunye namapolisa bahlangabezene njani nolu qhankqalazo?
questions.12: Ingaba amapolisa asebenzisa iintshukumo ezingena bungozi kakhulu (i-teargas, i-rubber bullets) okanye ezinobungozi (imipu) okanye zombini?
questions.13: Ingaba bakhona abantu abonzakalayo? Ngobani, babe bangaphi kwaye bonzakala kangakanani na?
questions.14: Abo bathi bonzakala babhekiswa kweziphi na izibhedlele okanye iikliniki ukuze bafumane unyango?
questions.15: Ukuba kukho iingxelo zoku sebenziswa kodlame ngama polisa ingaba unabo na ubungqina kwakunye nempendulo yamapolisa ngesi sehlo?
questions.16: Ithini imeko yolu qhankqalazo sithetha nje?
questions.2: Ingaba luqhankqalazo olunjani na olu? Ingaba ngumngcelele, ugwayimbo, uvalo-zitalato?
questions.3: Ngoobani abona baququzeli baphambili kolu qhankqalazo? Fumana izikhundla zabo ezisemthethweni, amaqela abo kwakunye nee nkcukhacha zabo zonxibelelwano.
questions.4: Ingaba oluqhankqalazo belucetyiwe okanye belunga cetywanga?
questions.6: Ingaba ii-NGO okanye amaqela ezo politiko ziyabandakanyeka okanye ziyachaphazeleka kolu qhankqalazo? Fumana amagama abantu, amaqela, iinkcukhacha nezizathu zobandakanyo lwabo.
questions.7: Bungakanani ubukhulu benginginya: ungaziqambeli ngokwakho! Dlana indlebe nabaququzeli kwakunye namapolisa.
questions.8: Fumana intetho nqo yaba ququzeleli malunga noqhankqalazo
questions.9: Dlana indlebe nabaqhankqalazi abali-10 ubuncinane: fumana amagama abo, iindawo abahlala kuzo, izizathu zabo zokuqhankqalaza, yintoni abafuna ukuyi feza?

questions.1: Ingozi yehle ngeliphi ixesha kwaye phi?

questions.1: Ngobani na amagama neenkcukacha zoqhagamshelwano zeengxwelerha? Amagama, iminyaka yobudala, iidilesi nezinye iinkcukacha.
questions.2: Ibiyi ntoni ulwaphulo-mthetho kwaye ludalwe njani na?
questions.3: Uthini umhla, ixesha kwakunye nendawo yolwaphulo-mthetho? Qondisisa kuma gosa asemthethweni.
questions.4: Kumba wokufa, yintoni imbangi esemthethweni? (Ngokwa magosa ezonyango olukhawulezileyo, amapolisa okanye naliphi na igosa/icandelo elisemthethweni.)
questions.5: Iingxwelerha zifumene monzakalo mni kwaye yintoni isikhali esisetyenzisiweyo?
questions.6: Yintoni na ekhuthaze esisenzo solwaphulo-mthetho kwaye ithini intsukaphi yengxwelerha? (Ukuba  ikhona indawo yayo)
questions.7: Bakhona abantu abathe babanjwa ngamapolisa kwaye bakhona abarhanelwa okanye imikhondo kusini na?
questions.8: Ingaba zikhona izehlo ezingaqondakaliyo nezingqonge indawo yolwaphulo-mthetho?
questions.9: Fumana izimvo zeengxwelerha, amangqina, amapolisa kwakunye nezinye iingxelo ezisemthethweni.

questions.10: Ingaba bekukho neziphi na izenzo zobukrothi okanye uhlangulo?
questions.12: Zingaphi injini zomlilo kwakunye nabacimi-mlilo abathe babandakanyeka?
questions.13: Imvelaphi yolwazi: U-Mphathi wesebe lezemililo, abezeenkonzo zohlangulo, iindawo zokugcina izidumbhu, ii-arhente zentlalo-ntle
questions.2: Ngoobani na iingxwelerha? Amagama, ubudala, iidilesi ezinye iinkcukhacha.
questions.3: Wenzeki phi na umlilo kwaye yintoni ebisitsha (isakhiwo, indlu, ibala etc)?
questions.4: Uqalise nini umlilo, unwenwele phi kwaye njani?
questions.5: Ucinywe/ulawulwe nini kwaye emva kwexesha elingakanani na umlilo?
questions.6: Amaxhoba abulewe kwaye onzakale njani, lingakanani na iqondo lokonzakala?
questions.7: Ulahleko lwempahla: kweliphi iqondo, ixabiso lomonakalo, i-insurance? Kuzomele ukuba uqhagamshelane nechule kulomcimbi.
questions.9: Abonzakeleyo nabafileyo bathathwa basiwa phi? (Kwesiphi isibhedlele okanye indawo yokugcina izidumbhu?)
